typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		year as string,
		{ID contrat cadre} as string,
		{ID contrat} as string,
		{ID levier} as string,
		{Max ID Seuil} as string,
		{Contrepartie seuil} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> seuil
source(output(
		{ID contrat cadre;ID contrat;ID levier;year;ca;R�alis�;Somme quantit�} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> remuneration
seuil sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CONTRAT_DISTRIBUTION.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> output
